testing.name: Violation of the territorial integrity of Ukrainian state - Hetman

question.text: What kind of historical figure referred to? In October 1659 Pereyaslavi made in interstate agreement on the terms proposed by the king's diplomats, leaders from
When the national territory of the Cossack Ukraine was divided into right and left Hetmanate?

answer.text: In 1663 after the failure of the government of Yuriy Khmelnytsky
In 1667, after signing the agreement Andrusiv

question.text: Which cities in the contract Pereyaslavs'kyi Yupiya Khmelnytsky camps had come from Moscow magistrates?

answer.text: In Kyiv, Pereiaslav Nizhyna, Chernihova, Bratslav, Umani

question.text: What was the result Chudnivskoyi campaign?
On the basis of a treaty was drawn up Slobodyshche agreement?
What were the consequences of the split in attitudes towards the Cossacks Slobodyshche contract?

answer.text: Yuri Khmelnytsky was forced to renounce power
A union of Cossack Ukraine under the sole auspices mace and King of Poland

answer.text: At the council under Hermanivka in Kyiv region
